property.name: featureName
property.value: Perform Login on BioMark Test Page

testcase.name: Perform_Login_on_BioMark_Test_Page.Valid_User_Login
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I navigate to url "https://internal-doctor.biomarking.com/login" ✅ Then I see title page "Doctors Portal | Biomark" is displayed ✅ When I enter username "scenario_sy@mailinator.com" ✅ And I enter password "1qw21qw2" ✅ And I tap Login button ✅ Then I can see "View My Profile" text displayed ✅ And I perform logout

testcase.name: Perform_Login_on_BioMark_Test_Page.Invalid_User_Login_Valid_Email_Address_invalid_Password
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I navigate to url "https://internal-doctor.biomarking.com/login" ✅ Then I see title page "Doctors Portal | Biomark" is displayed ✅ When I enter username "scenario_sy@mailinator.com" ✅ And I enter password "1qw21qw2e" ✅ And I tap Login button ✅ Then I can see "The email address or the password you inputted is incorrect" text displayed
